title: Winners - 24-hour AI/ML Hackathon at BIT - PRAVUKTI 2024
description: Won the 24-hour AI/ML Hackathon for developing an AI-powered navigation system for visually impaired individuals using OpenCV and real-time audio feedback. Recognized with the KIOT Achievers Award 2024-25.

title: First Place - Make a Project (MAP) Expo
description: Awarded First Place for 'Result Analysis and Visualization (RAV)', a Django-based project aimed at simplifying semester result analysis using Python, Pandas, Seaborn, and other tools. Inspired by real faculty challenges, our team developed a more efficient and visual alternative to Excel-based methods.

title: Best Consultancy Project Award - Achievers Day
description: Received recognition for developing a production schedule automation system for JSW, significantly improving their production processes. Honored during the Achievers Day ceremony alongside teammates NAVEEN BALU, Hariharasudhan S, and VIDHUMITHAA G.
